type: TRUCK, DUMPS/DUMP SPREADERS, HEAVY (CONFIGURATION A,B,C) GROUP 2
short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of 11 TRUCK, DUMPS/DUMP SPREADERS, HEAVY (CONFIGURATIONS A, B, C) GROUP 2
description: For information, please contact the contracting authority: Genevieve Roach Genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of 11 TRUCK, DUMPS/DUMP SPREADERS, HEAVY (CONFIGURATIONS A, B, C) GROUP 2 being delivered to Wainwright, Gagetown, and Petawawa and related items in accordance with Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-16TRUK. This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HP-16TRUK. If you wish to become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, refer to: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-539-73419. As a requirement of the SA, this notice is published on Buyandsell.gc.ca for a period of fifteen (15) calendar days. The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is on or before 120 days ARO. There is no security requirement associated with this requirement. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
